title: New: Keep Shelly In Athens – Struggle With Yourself
body:
Having just been named as Greece’s top export in 2011 (kidding but almost not), **Keep Shelly In Athens** are back with a new jam.

Heavily Cocteau Twins inspired, it’s a darker avenue than they’ve previously stumbled down, twisting and turning throughout it’s three minute length. It’s perhaps not as suited to the live circuit as the likes of _Running Out Of You_ and _Our Own Dream_, but it feels more tailored for a narrative based full length release. Check out _Struggle With Yourself_ below.

 [Keep Shelly in Athens – Struggle With Yourself](http://soundcloud.com/keepshellyinathens/keep-shelly-in-athens-struggle) by [Keep Shelly in Athens](http://soundcloud.com/keepshellyinathens)
